title: Strategies for Enhancing Pre-Service Teacher Engagement in Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Corporate-commissioned training program for strengthening science teachers' job competencies. Team-based project execution in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more interaction strategies based on a constructivist approach in online science lessons.
Learners can implement peer feedback and collaborative problem-solving strategies in a PBL environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop a process-oriented assessment system using digital tools and apply it to peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
